# container <img src="images/logo.png" align="right" width="163" height="104"/>

container provides common container data structures deque, set, dict (resembling
Python's dict type) and dict.table (combining dict and data.table) with
typical member functions to insert, delete and access container elements.
Furthermore, provides iterators and supports both reference and copy semantics.

## Installation

You can install the released version of container from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install release version from CRAN
install.packages("container")

# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("rpahl/container")
```


## Example

```{r example}
library(container)

co = container(1, b = NA, 1:3, c = container("a", 1))
co
```

```{r}
length(co)
```

```{r}
names(co)
```

```{r}
as.list(co)
```

```{r}
unpack(co)
```
